mapper.sql: supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_linkman, supplier_phone, supplier_address, supplier_bank, supplier_account, supplier_note,supplier_create_time,supplier_update_time
mapper.select:
select
from supplier
supplier_name like concat(concat('%',#{supplierName}),'%')
supplier_linkman like concat(concat('%',#{supplierLinkman}),'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(supplier_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(supplier_create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into supplier (supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_linkman, supplier_phone, supplier_address, supplier_bank, supplier_account, supplier_note,supplier_create_time,supplier_update_time) values (#{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierAccount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{supplierUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into supplier
supplier_id,
supplier_name,
supplier_linkman,
supplier_phone,
supplier_address,
supplier_bank,
supplier_account,
supplier_note,
supplier_create_time
supplier_update_time
#{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierAccount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{supplierNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{supplierCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{supplierUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update supplier
supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_linkman = #{supplierLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_phone = #{supplierPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT},
supplier_address = #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_bank = #{supplierBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_account = #{supplierAccount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
supplier_note = #{supplierNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_update_time = #{supplierUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update supplier set supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_linkman = #{supplierLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_phone = #{supplierPhone,jdbcType=BIGINT}, supplier_address = #{supplierAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_bank = #{supplierBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_account = #{supplierAccount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, supplier_note = #{supplierNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_update_time = #{supplierUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
